This debt crisis has catapulted the conversation about free college into living rooms and coffee shops around the country PERIOD In  UW President Ana Mari Cauce defended the price of higher education and highlighted the UWs financial aid programs PERIOD

Talk about free college it already exists Cauce said PERIOD

With  of students still needing to take out loans free college may be further than some think at the UW and certainly nationwide PERIOD Since June  the national student debt has more than doubled from  billion to where it now stands at nearly . trillion PERIOD As a result candidates for the  democratic nomination are pushing the idea of free college to the forefront of their platforms PERIOD

The proposals are varied with Sen PERIOD Bernie Sanders urging for a complete wipeout of all student debt and tuitionfree college going forward while Sen PERIOD Elizabeth Warren proposes an incomebased debt relief program PERIOD

Former Vice President Joe Biden has yet to outline a specific plan but has in the past expressed his belief that we need to commit to  years of free public education for all our children. sen PERIOD Cory Booker has shown support by cosponsoring the Debt Free College Act and has proposed a program of government bonds given to newborns that could help lowincome families pay for their childrens college education PERIOD

Mayor Pete Buttigieg has proposed plans to make public college free for lowand middleincome families through both state and federal partnerships and an expansion of the Pell Grant PERIOD
